name: Repetparations
description:
A game about petting doggos!

Based on Sticky Justice!

A & D to walk, W to interact, and Enter to advance text!
Click to pet the doggos in battle!

Achievements:

Mozart! All our music was done by Jamasan. Find all the songs he made for this jam here: https://soundcloud.com/user-121506944/sets/shenanijam-2018-repetparations

Aditionally, all our art was done by the lovely Raven!
